Datatable.LocalizationPair: Raise your [militaristColored] #B82738#Militarist#REVERT# support to at least 15% in $Amount01Name Systems
+10% Ship Health, +10% Shield Capacity and +10% Defense on Plating and Shields
+20% Ship Health, +20% Shield Capacity and +20% Defense on Plating and Shields

Swarm Missiles fire many missiles in short bursts. Their purpose is to break through enemy flak defenses. Swarm missile bursts fire before other missiles, ensuring maximum protection against enemy flak defense. Using better versions, increases the missile count on each burst and subsequently determines whether none or all of your missiles reach their target.

Firing simultaneously with its host Kinetic weapon, Flak targets incoming projectiles, Squadrons and Boarding Pods. Flak completely counters equal amounts of same tier missiles. Increasing the total amount of flak in your flotilla also increases the effectiveness of each flak module resulting in even better defense against missiles and drop pods.
Using a centralized projectile course detection system, multiple flak weapons can be coordinated to shoot down hostile projectiles effectively.
Damage Bonus per Target CP on all Ships
